main event: On 7 Sep 55, several jet pilots and air traffic control operators observed unusual stationary objects in the sky over Teheran, which then moved in various directions at high speed.
interesting points: The objects were tracked by ground radar and were observed simultaneously by multiple pilots and technicians., Two Iranian AF F-86 Sabre jets were scrambled on 6 May 1959 to investigate four unidentified objects detected on radar., The objects were tracked at speeds up to 600-700 mph and altitudes up to 60,000 ft., During the interception attempts, the lead pilot's instruments failed and lights went out, causing him to abort the mission., Observers reported feeling strong static electricity sensations before and after sightings.
witness description: jet pilots, air traffic control tower operators, and technicians
